DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate Proton Pump Inhibitors ( PPI 's ) decrease blood level 25-Hydroxyvitamin D ( 25-OH Vitamin D ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Proton Pump Inhibitors ( PPI 's ) Blood Levels 25-Hydroxyvitamin D .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects ( DoD beneficiary ) recruit male female subject least 18 year age Nellis Air Force Base dependents retiree . A total 65 subject recruit . Screening Visit : - Obtain sign Informed Consent document HIPAA Authorization - Women child bear potential serum pregnancy test ( approximately 1-2 teaspoon blood ) - 25-OH Vitamin D baseline level draw via 1 venipuncture ( approximately 1-2 teaspoon blood ) Visit 1 ( within 1 week screen visit ) : • Subjects prescribe oral omeprazole 20mg ( proton pump inhibitor ) one Investigators . Subject take oral omeprazole 20mg 60 consecutive day . Telephone Call 1 ( 2 week visit 1 ) : • Review patient ( see attach telephone call script ) - If take omeprazole 20 mg prescribe ? ( study show patient recall accurate pill count ) - Review adverse effect patient may experience . Telephone Call 2 ( 2 week Telephone Call 1 ) : • Review patient ( see attach telephone call script ) - If take omeprazole 20 mg prescribe ? ( study show patient recall accurate pill count ) - Review adverse effect patient may experience . Telephone Call 3 ( 2 week Telephone Call 2 ) : - Review patient ( see attach telephone call script ) - If take omeprazole 20 mg prescribe ? ( study show patient recall accurate pill count ) - Review adverse effect patient may experience . - Schedule Final Visit 2 . Final Visit 2 ( 60 day take omeprazole ) : - Review patient : - If take omeprazole 20 mg prescribe ? ( study show patient recall accurate pill count ) - Review adverse effect patient may experience . - 25-OH Vitamin D level draw via 1 venipuncture ( approximately 1-2 teaspoon blood ) ( research-driven ) . Patient 's participation study complete Final Visit 2 . The data analyze paper write submit scientific journal . If time study , subject decides withdraw study , may test require . If subject becomes pregnant study , tell stop omeprazole withdrawn study refer PCM standard care treatment . Patients must agree take precaution prevent pregnancy course study due possible severe harm Omeprazole may cause unborn child . The completely reliable method birth control total abstinence surgical removal uterus . Other method , use condom , diaphragm cervical cap , birth control pill , IUD , sperm kill product totally effective preventing pregnancy . Also , woman breastfeed may participate study . If time , 25-OH Vitamin D level measure find 10 , patient notify immediately stop take oral Omeprazole 20mg refer PCM initiate standard care treatment . Oral omeprazole 20mg Food & Drug Administration approve dosage . Its use protocol consider standard care since use healthy subject . `` In accordance 21 CFR 312.2 ( b ) ( i-v ) , IND exemption request base follow provision : ( ) The investigation intend report FDA well-controlled study support new indication use intend used support significant change label drug ; ( ii ) If drug undergo investigation lawfully market prescription drug product , investigation intend support significant change advertising product ; ( iii ) The investigation involve route administration dosage level use patient population factor significantly increase risk ( decrease acceptability risk ) associate use drug product ; ( iv ) The investigation conduct compliance requirement institutional review set forth part 56 requirement informed consent set forth part 50 ; ( v ) The investigation conduct compliance requirement §312.7 . ''
DOC.criteria: Tricare Insurance Beneficiary ( military insurance ) receive care Nellis AFB Male Female ( DoD beneficiary ) least 18 year age live Las Vegas area least 3 month . Subjects le 18 year age . Subjects know malabsorption condition . 25OH Vitamin D le 10 Pregnancy Non English speak Taking prescription medication counter antacid Vitamin supplement ( exclude multivitamin supplement due relatively low dose vitamin D ) Any medical condition require regular monitoring health care provider
